title: 18th August 1612: The trials of nine Lancashire women and two men known as the Pendle Witches begin
itunes:summary: The trials of the Pendle Witches are not only some of the most famous but also some of the best recorded witch trials in British history, and represent two per cent of all British witches to face trial over three ...
